title: Secret Agent: Hostage v1.0.4 full [apkpita]
description:
Unlike the games youâ€™ve played before, Secret Agent is an interactive real video (First person view) and role-playing puzzle game. Are you ready to be an agent?

Save your secret agent who got captured. Crack codes, guess passwords, and solve other logic puzzles. Feel like a real secret agent on a dangerous mission. Go to Istanbul, drive through its streets in a car, and explore the city sights. Get envelopes with secret missions, release hostages using your outstanding wits.

Neutralizes explosive devices, open combination locks, collect clues, and follow in the trail of the kidnappers.

In this 100% real-life action game, you will:
- solve Addictive puzzles
- find secret passwords
- trust your reflexes
- take part in an absorbing story
- visit real Istanbul locations
- use gyroscope and much more.

Secret Agent: Istanbul also gives you a chance to see Istanbulâ€™s historical places such as Galata Tower, Sultanahmet and much more. Be ready to see old places and feel the history! Download now and have fun.

Supported Languages: English, Turkish, japanese, Chinese, Arabic, Spanish, Russian

Whatâ€™s new:
Added Russian Language

Requirements: Android OS 4.3 and up
